name: Promotion Class - Earthkeeper
description:
Role: Healing

With a single-minded focus of healing and resource regeneration, the chosen of Gaea are welcomed by all.

Grants the Life Power Tray and the following powers:
Will O' Wisps
Circle Of Life
Ironwood Body

Increases by 10%:
Final Mitigations Cap

Traits Granted:
Gaea's Inspiration
Mail Armor Proficiency
Mystical Staff Proficiency

New Mechanic: Essence Burn
Life Powers will generate Essence when used. If your Essence fills over 80% you will gain Essence Burn, causing you to take damage each second until you die or reduce your Essence under 80%.

Using powers in the Death Powers Tray will reduce your Essence.


WARNING: Purchasing this talent promotes you to the Earthkeeper promotion class and prevents access to the Archdruid and Stormcaller promotion classes.
